评论概述: Nice Glasses, but NOT for very small faces.

评论概述: Petite size is the perfect fit.

评论概述: Love the color of these lenses
评论详情: I purchased these because of the color of the lenses as well as the frames not being huge since I have a small face. With that said they are super tight on my face to the point that I cannot wear them for an extended period of time. If I do they start to cause pain. If you are wearing them to just drive around and what not they are great!

评论概述: They really are for a narrow face!
评论详情: I thought Amazon would bar me from returns. I’ve ordered and returned so many sunglasses! Nothing ever fits. But finally. FINALLY a pair that fits me.  The listing doesn’t mention the measurements which most listings don’t which leads to so many returns so for these the measurements are 53-17-140

评论概述: Comfortable, but lenses aren't very dark
评论详情: These are comfortable and easy to wear. They have a solid nose piece so it won't get tangled in your hair if you put them on top of your head. And it came with a little carrying case / sleeve that I wasn't expecting, which was a nice surprise.  Minus 1 star because the lenses aren't very dark. These would be more for fashion and style versus truly blocking bright light on a sunny day.
